Container.Name: CouchPotato
Container.Overview: CouchPotato (CP) is an automatic NZB and torrent downloader. You can keep a "movies I want"-list and it will search for NZBs/torrents of these movies every X hours. Once a movie is found, it will send it to SABnzbd or download the torrent to a specified directory.

Config.Name: Config directory
Config.Description: Host path to store CP's databases and configuration.

Config.Name: User shares
Config.Description: unRAID's path to user shares with cache.

Config.Name: Run as specified user
Config.Description: Run application with specified user name.

Config.Name: Run with user ID
Config.Description: Run application with specified user id.

Config.Name: Run with group ID
Config.Description: Run application with specified group id.

Config.Name: Permission mask.
Config.Description: Mask controlling permission of newly create files and directories.

Config.Name: CouchPotato Web UI Port
Config.Description: CP's Web UI Port used to access and configure the service.
